column1: in memory of betty june wilson -- woodfin funeral chapels| born: september 18
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:woodfin funeral chapelsmurfreesboro
column10: 2015. she was a native of murfreesboro
column11: and daughter of the late a. w. and jessie spence eaton. funeral services will be 2:00 pm friday at woodfin memorial chapel with bro. daryl lewis officiating. burial will be in evergreen cemetery. visitation will be from 4:00-8:00 thursday at woodfin memorial chapel. mrs. wilson is survived by daughters
column12: kaye (jim) harris and mary lou (marty) fuller; son
column13: larry (lisa) wilson all of murfreesboro; grandchildren
column18: megan fuller and fiance matt henley
column20: and michelle and jared wilson; great granddaughters
column21: eliza pate harris and abigail marie harris; brothers
column26: and larry (connie) eaton all of murfreesboro; and a sister mary lowe of murfreesboro. she was preceded in death by her husband jesse b. wilson; son
column28: nancy eaton and audrey arnold; and a granddaughter
column29: elizabeth pate harris. mrs. wilson was a member of the crescent church of christ. grandsons and sons will serve as pallbearers. the family would like to thank the staff of stones river manor
column31: and avalon hospice for their loving care of june bug. memorials may be made to boulevard terrace activities fund
column34: tn 37129. online condolences may be made at www. woodfinchapel. com.
